channel.title: Rank?
channel.description: Well, Im a new beginner to 508's, and Im wondering how to make myself an admin. I am using BoneScape Source.

item.title: Rank?
item.dc:creator: @smud_pk_mods smud pk mods
item.description:
@smud_pk_mods wrote:

Hey I made bonescape and I don’t know if you’re still having this problem but- you can go into your own player file as I recall it’s
build>data>characters>mainsave> then find your character, open it in notepad and change it’s rights to 2. That will make it admin.
Also, you can go into commands.java and find my name- I’m pretty sure there’s 4 people with owner rights. Change any one of those usernames to your own name and you will be able to use all the owner commands.
Remember to compile =)

Read full topic

item.title: Rank?
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

For the character files : “build\data\characters\mainsave”
For making your self admin by command - Go to command.java, There might be a name there of the last
owner that used that source. Replace it with your username.

Read full topic

item.title: Rank?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

I think it’s in the login class in 508 something like

if (p.username.equals("name")) { p.rights = #; }

Read full topic

item.title: Rank?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:363288”][quote author=sageofmali link=topic=459543.msg3362205#msg3362205 date=1286487163]
Open up your player profile in SERVERNAME>Data>Saved Games>Your user.xml then press ctrl+f and search for rights and change it to 2 or 3.
[/quote]
This is 508, and this is bonescape, its written in chinease the characters thing.[/quote]Open it in wordpad, not notepad.

Read full topic

Open up your player profile in SERVERNAME>Data>Saved Games>Your user.xml then press ctrl+f and search for rights and change it to 2 or 3.

This is 508, and this is bonescape, its written in chinease the characters thing.
